sentences.sContent: The next day, we drove inland.
sentences.sCn: 第二天，我们乘车开往内陆。

sentences.sContent: We beached the boat and headed inland.
sentences.sContent_eng: We beached the boat and headed inland.
sentences.sCn: 我们想使船靠岸，朝内陆方向驶去。

sentences.sContent: In 1985 a glacier buried this shore; since then the ice has retreated a half mile inland.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1985 a glacier buried this shore; since then the ice has retreated a half mile inland.
sentences.sCn: 1985年，一座冰川在海滨融化，自那时起冰川已经向内陆退缩了半英里。

synos.tran: 在内地；向内地；[地理]向内陆；在内陆

phrases.pCn: 内陆航道；内陆水路；内陆水道
内河运输；内河航运署；内陆航运

trans.tranOther: an inland area, city etc is not near the coast

trans.tranCn: 在内地；向内地；向内陆；在内陆
trans.tranOther: in a direction away from the coast and towards the centre of a country
